name: Star Wars Generator
content: A random starWars character generator for your lore purposes.

name: MySteamList
content: A place where you can save your favorite games or create a wishlist list for future games you wish to get in the future.

name: JavaScript Quiz
content: A simple quiz with a timer that keeps your score stored into local-storage for you to try and beat your high-score.

name: Forecast Weather
content: Find local or cross country city! This reports the weather for the next five days in any USA city you search.

name: Password Generator
content: A password generator that lets you select what you want included in your password and how long.

name: Work Day Scheduler
content: A work day scheduler that helps you keep track of what you need to get done today
